EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*You're Loyal Blue*
YOU'RE INVITED
Congratulations! Based on {!Account.Name} offering BlueWave to customers first, we are thrilled to invite you to our Tier 1, Loyal Blue, perks program.
"Loyal Blue" partner status means your team is eligible to sell Community Solar, and much more!
Why offer Community Solar?
Re-Connect with leads who did not follow through with rooftop installations Offer "one-stop-solar" for new leads Top-off eligible solar loan customers for 100% solar power Earn up to $1,500 in commission per customer, per project
Community Solar is Just the Beginning...
Additional Loyal Blue Benefits:
Event Sponsorship: Co-Exhibiting at key industry events Exclusive Sales Perks: Think tickets to March Madness 2018 Training: Subsidies available for your team And more..!
Interested? Talk to your BlueWave partner about signing a Sales Service Agreement (SSA) to unlock the ability to sell Community Solar to customers.
Thanks for working with BlueWave to provide Solar for Everyone, Everywhere.
- All of us here at BlueWave
General Partner Support 888-817-2703 PartnerSupport@bluewavesolar.com Partner Support is available 8AM - 8PM EST
